snippet.title: Ludical Trailer (Itch.io)
snippet.description:
Your soul is trapped in lines of code. What will you do?



Thanks to science you can now upload the consciousness of a human being inside a computer. The Gametoy which is the first fully immersive Video Game Console is finally out to the public! In which reality and digital video games collide. The lives of many can now last forever in a computer. However, something goes terribly wrong with all the consoles across the entire globe. The minds of young and old have been trapped in all the machines. You the child of an employee that works at a company called "Technologic" must figure out what went wrong with the system. As you multitask beating video game levels and avoiding the dreaded rouge AIs that resemble nightmarish versions of a family. You will soon realize no one is to be trusted.

https://newbo-games.itch.io/ludical
